inclusion.criterion: Females and male subjects, ages 18-65 inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have migraines with or without aura as expressed by the International Headache Society (IHS) criteria for at least six months and at least one attack per month for three months prior to screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If female, have an acceptable method of contraception during the study, have no plans to become pregnant and have a negative urine pregnancy test at screening and throughout the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Must be able to follow study protocol including all neuropsychological testing, MEWT assessments and evaluation forms.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Reviewing with patient headache severity and symptom assessment forms
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with the history of recurrent bilateral headache. She has been diagnosed with migraine headache and is under treatment.
